name: Elmo's Funworld!
description:
A challenging survival-horror game

(THIS GAME MIGHT BE LOUD AT FIRST)

ㅤ

Â̴̼̗͖̥͔͂͘̚B̷̨̛̹̹͕̳̃͗͝Ỏ̷̭̬͉̇̈́̍͐͠ͅU̵̝͕̫̹̘͌̀͛̋̍̈́́̕͝Ț̷͙̃̈̿́̄͘

Meet your favorite "Sesame Street" characters in E̶̡̡͉̹̳̜̬͕͈̪̋͋̕͝l̴̮̼̻̳̞̘̄̈́́̍͐̋̚M̴̨̛̩̲͉̰̣̆̔͐̑̂̆̄͐͘͜ö̴̧͚̜̳̞͕̺̺̠̟́͋̈̚͝͝S̷̳̪͖͕͇̬͋́̇́̅̐͘   new funhouse!

Collect 7 Crayons and ȓ̴̡͎̣̲̿̅͋͘͘͠͝ủ̷̖̈n̶̤̤͗̂͌̾̚͝ ̶̡̠̞͓̼̗̝͇̣̯͒̂͊f̶͚̱̬̣̫͗̊͂̾̋̍͘ǒ̵͈̞͈̎̕͜͜͠ͅr̵͔͕̟̘̰͈̼͂̐̽̐̒͂̎̿͌͜ ̵̠̤̙̻͕͎̹̼̓ỷ̵̗̤̲͓̜̻̞̣o̵͎͍̰̲̼͒́̀ū̴̻̯͕͓̓̽̑́̒͑̑͝ȓ̵̡̢̘̩͙̳͒̀̈́͆̈̑̀̕͜͝ ̷̦̞̝̀̄͗͒̂l̷͓̟̞̜̍͋į̶̡̘͈͓̽̐f̶͉̦͒́̿̔̽͗̄̄̚̕ẻ̵̢̪̪͈̝̟̰͔̥̀̑̃ -- draw with Elmo!

This game is a fun-filled adventure for all families, kids and toddlers!

Collect Elmo's 7 crayons and escape his property.

ITEMS (click to use/toggle)

Cookie - Increases Max Stamina

Repellent - When used near Elmo, it freezes him for 3 seconds

"Water" Bottle - When used, recharges stamina to full

Flashlight - it's a flashlight bozo

ㅤ INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS
  • Download .zip file
  • Right click on the highlighted .zip file > Extract All
  • Double click on Elmo's Funworld.exe
Ṡ̴̚̚U̷͑̀͆͗̅͗̋͠Ṗ̷͙̯̞͒̑P̶̌̈́͐̏͝O̶͓̽̌Ṟ̴̺͌̾T̶̰̠̂͛̈́̈̊͑̾ͅ

Thanks for all of the videos on the game, they are all awesome!

This game was made by MemerManStan, and any other claims are false.

Please report any glitches or bugs in the game, and I will get to fixing them as soon as possible.
